ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 542
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not always true. We had a real jerk bind himself just inside the zone in lower guk, head DEEP inside, whack one frog, and gate. The ensuing trained killed
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Mon, 29 Nov 1999 19:51:45 -0500
> From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>
> Subject: Selos and trains underground
>In the dungeons that are "underground" there are
>usually less trains
>to zone (there are exceptions). This is because the
>person
>who gets over his head can't run fast enough to make
>it to zone. They
>will die 20 feet away and the train never happens.
>
>A caster gating out has the same effect as death.
>The monster drops
>the player off the hate list. Unless someone else is
>also on
>the hate list (or too close), the monster will return
>to it's normal
>spot.

Not always true. We had a real jerk bind himself just
inside the zone in lower guk, head DEEP inside, whack
one frog, and gate. The ensuing trained killed almost
everyone between frog #1 and the zone. Gate is only
safer when used by non-idiots - an all too rare
commodity these days. I for one, would love to play on
an adults only server. Make you have to prove you're
over 18, maybe pass an IQ test first. Maybe have
stricter rules and make it easy to get booted off the
server. You wouldn't be banned from eq, just from the
one server. That'd be so nice, a server with no
stupid children shouting to zone, causing trains,
typing without using consonants, swearing flagrantly,
etc. Too bad it would never happen.



Double
